verses.roman:
'gopāla-campū' nāma grantha sāra kaila
vraja-prema-līlā-rasa-sāra dekhāila

synonyms: gopāla-campū—Gopāla-campū; nāma—named; grantha sāra—the essence of all Vedic literature; kaila—made; vraja—of Vṛndāvana; prema—of love; līlā—of pastimes; rasa—of mellows; sāra—essence; dekhāila—exhibited.
translation: He also compiled the book named Gopāla-campū, which is the essence of all Vedic literature. In this book he has exhibited the ecstatic loving transactions and pastimes of Rādhā and Kṛṣṇa in Vṛndāvana.
